content: HDB Hollow drill bit connector Replacement connectors for attaching hollow drill bits to a vacuum cleaner ### Categories: Home > Products > Tool inserts > Concrete and masonry drill bits- - ### FEATURES:Features Improve longevity – prolong the usable life of your hollow drill bit Better avoid waste – economically replace only the worn or damaged parts, not the whole drill bit Applications Replacing worn-out or damaged components of adapters connecting hollow drill bits to a vacuum cleaner for dust extraction ### TECHNICAL DATA: Connection end: Various Base material: n/a Technical Data | Connection end | Various | Base material | n/a ### ITEMS- 2023719 - Hollow drill bit repl collar TE-CD - Package Size 1 pc - 2024360 - Replacement collar HDB TE-YDA - Package Size 1 pc
